['The title has been revived several times over the years, but the original series is most notable for its mix of adventure, humor, and sci-fi elements.', 'The original series was launched in January 1959 and ran for 345 issues until March 1978.', 'Arsenal was one of the many comic book titles published by IPC Magazines, which also included other popular series like 2000 AD, Battle Picture Weekly, and Whizzer and Chips.', "The comic's format typically featured a mix of standalone stories and ongoing serials, with genres ranging from science fiction to fantasy, adventure, and humor.", 'Some notable characters created for Arsenal include the space-faring adventurer Captain Pugwash, the time-traveling duo Time Squad, and the robot-humans hybrid series, Robot Rebel Gang.', 'Arsenal was known for its humorous tone, often incorporating parody and satire into its stories.']
